member.name: T:Console.Script.Async.AsyncRunner
member.summary: Class that Implements Async Script Sequences

member.name: F:Console.Script.Async.AsyncRunner.ScopeSettings
member.summary: Sets the Position where new SubRunner get added. SubLevel => as Sub of the Runner that started the Sequence

member.name: F:Console.Script.Async.AsyncRunner.ExecutionOrder
member.summary: Sets the Order in which the Runners Get Executed SubFirst => Sub Runners have Higher Priority than the ParentRunner

member.name: F:Console.Script.Async.AsyncRunner.SubOrder
member.summary: Sets the Order in which the SubRunners get executed.

member.name: F:Console.Script.Async.AsyncRunner.Name
member.summary: The Name of the AsyncRunner. This is used to Avoid Unpredictable Results when executing the same content at the same time.

member.name: M:Console.Script.Async.AsyncRunner.#cctor
member.summary: Static Constructor

member.name: M:Console.Script.Async.AsyncRunner.#ctor
member.summary: Public Constructor

member.summary: Public Constructor
member.param: The Parameter Collection of the Runner

member.summary: Public Constructor
member.param: The Parameter Collection of the Runner
Name of the Async Runner.(Used to manage Async Execution of the Same Content

member.name: P:Console.Script.Async.AsyncRunner.Parent
member.summary: The Parent of this Async Runner

member.name: P:Console.Script.Async.AsyncRunner.Params
member.summary: The Parameter Collection of this Runner

member.name: P:Console.Script.Async.AsyncRunner.Current
member.summary: The Current Runner that is used

member.name: P:Console.Script.Async.AsyncRunner.SubsFinished
member.summary: True if all Subrunners Finished Executing

member.name: P:Console.Script.Async.AsyncRunner.ThisFinished
member.summary: True if this Runner finished executing its content

member.name: P:Console.Script.Async.AsyncRunner.Finished
member.summary: True if the Runner and All SubRunners Finished Executing

member.name: E:Console.Script.Async.AsyncRunner.OnFinish
member.summary: Gets Invoked when the AsyncRunner finishes executing the Content

member.name: M:Console.Script.Async.AsyncRunner.AddSub(Console.Script.Async.AsyncRunner)
member.summary: Adds a Sub Runner to this runner

member.name: M:Console.Script.Async.AsyncRunner.GetNextSub
member.summary: Returns the Next SubRunner of this Runner

member.name: M:Console.Script.Async.AsyncRunner.GetCurrent
member.summary: Returns the Runner that should be executed next

member.name: M:Console.Script.Async.AsyncRunner.GetLine
member.summary: Returns the Next Line of this Runner NULL if ThisFinished is true

member.name: M:Console.Script.Async.AsyncRunner.Clean
member.summary: Removes all Finished Runners

member.name: T:Console.Script.Async.ScriptExecutionOrder
member.summary: Sets the Order in which the Runners get Executed SubFirst => Sub Runners have Higher Priority than the Parent

member.name: F:Console.Script.Async.ScriptExecutionOrder.ParentFirst
member.summary: Will Execute the Parent Script Content before Executing the Subscripts

member.name: F:Console.Script.Async.ScriptExecutionOrder.SubFirst
member.summary: Will Execute the Sub Scripts before continuing the Parent Script

member.name: T:Console.Script.Async.ScriptScopeSettings
member.summary: Specifies the Position where new Runners get Added.

member.name: F:Console.Script.Async.ScriptScopeSettings.SubLevel
member.summary: Will be executed as Subscript of the Parent

member.name: F:Console.Script.Async.ScriptScopeSettings.ParentLevel
member.summary: Will be executed on the Same Level as the Parent Script

member.name: T:Console.Script.Async.SubScriptOrder
member.summary: Specifies the Order in which the SubRunner get executed in turns

member.name: F:Console.Script.Async.SubScriptOrder.Stack
member.summary: The Last Script that got Inserted at this level will be finished first

member.name: F:Console.Script.Async.SubScriptOrder.Queue
member.summary: The First Script that got Inserted at this level will be finished first

member.name: F:Console.Script.Async.SubScriptOrder.Rotating
member.summary: The Subscripts will get one execution cycle in turns
